description:
This test STAC catalog contains Mars data collections and sub-catalogs currently hosted and distributed by
[PSUP](http://psup.ias.u-psud.fr/sitools/client-user/index.html?project=PLISonMars) (Planetary SUrface Portal).

![Mars](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7a/Mars_%28white_background%29.jpg/120px-Mars_%28white_background%29.jpg)
